info.description: A hierarchical configuration service - returns overridable configuration values based on a core default
info.title: Config Service Service API

get.description: Find a merged Config by name. Will return the merged Config as JSON

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: Namespace of the config

parameters.name: configName
parameters.description: Name of the config

put.summary: Replace Patch with the given selector

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: Namespace of the config

parameters.name: configName
parameters.description: Name of the config

parameters.name: patchV1
parameters.description: Patch we will use to update an existing Patch

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Optional Path target, if specified will remove operations starting with this path before inserting your list of operations

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Filters to be used when inserting your operations based off of path, only used when you provide a path

put.summary: Replace Patches for Configs in Namespaces

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: bulkPatches
parameters.description: Namespace Configs to be upserted

entityId.description: Entity ID Assignment Context for a Config Object

productId.description: Product ID Assignment Context for a Config Object

tenantId.description: Tenant ID Assignment Context for a Config Object

updatedOn.description: When the Config was last modified

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

createdOn.description: Created on date for the patch.

updatedOn.description: Updated on date for the patch.

op.description: Patch op used (ADD, COPY, REMOVE, REPLACE)

path.description: Pointer for Patch Operation. This navigates the JSON tree.

value.description: Value for Patch Operation. Any valid JSON, including JSON object, JSON array, string, number, true, false, null.

from.description: Pointer for Patch COPY Operation. This represents the source node in the JSON tree.

overridable.description: Whether or not this can be overridden in the merge logic

entityId.description: Entity ID Assignment Context for a Patch

operations.description: List of JSON patch operations for a Patch

tenantId.description: Tenant ID Assignment Context for a Patch

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.
